title: A Deep Dive Into Jobs, The Markets, And Crypto
itunes:title: A Deep Dive Into Jobs, The Markets, And Crypto
description:
Constance Hunter, Chief Economist at KPMG, discusses the jobs report. Peter Andersen, founder of Andersen Capital Management, talks about the markets and investment strategies. Scott Freeman, co-founder and partner at JST Capital, has the latest on the crypto space. Tom Gimbel, Founder and CEO of LaSalle Network, discusses the jobs report and hiring trends. Hosted by Matt Miller and Sonali Basak.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
